Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseSaveBuilder

Packages that use DatabaseSaveBuilder
Package
Description
org.fluentjdbc
Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

  • Uses of DatabaseSaveBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

    Subclasses of DatabaseSaveBuilder in org.fluentjdbc
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DatabaseSaveBuilderWithLong
    Subclass of DatabaseSaveBuilder which uses DatabaseInsertBuilder.setPrimaryKey(String, Object) in order to autogenerate primary key field
    class 
    DatabaseSaveBuilderWithoutGeneratedKeys<T>
    Subclass of DatabaseSaveBuilder which assumes the client code always specifies primary key field
    class 
    DatabaseSaveBuilderWithUUID
    Subclass of DatabaseSaveBuilder which uses UUID.randomUUID() to generate primary key values
    Methods in org.fluentjdbc that return DatabaseSaveBuilder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<Long>
    DatabaseTable.newSaveBuilder(String idColumn, Long idValue)
    Creates a DatabaseSaveBuilder which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<Long>
    DatabaseTableImpl.newSaveBuilder(String idField, Long id)
    Creates a DatabaseSaveBuilder which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<Long>
    DatabaseTable.newSaveBuilderNoGeneratedKeys(String idColumn, Long idValue)
    Use instead of DatabaseTable.newSaveBuilder(java.lang.String, java.lang.Long) if the database driver does not support RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<Long>
    DatabaseTableImpl.newSaveBuilderNoGeneratedKeys(String idField, Long id)
    Use instead of DatabaseTableImpl.newSaveBuilder(java.lang.String, java.lang.Long) if the database driver does not support RETURN_GENERATED_KEYS
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<String>
    DatabaseTable.newSaveBuilderWithString(String idColumn, String idValue)
    Creates a DatabaseSaveBuilder which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<String>
    DatabaseTableImpl.newSaveBuilderWithString(String idField, String id)
    Creates a DatabaseSaveBuilder which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<UUID>
    DatabaseTable.newSaveBuilderWithUUID(String fieldName, UUID uuid)
    Creates a DatabaseSaveBuilder which creates a INSERT or UPDATE statement, depending on whether the row already exists in the database.
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<T>
    DatabaseSaveBuilder.setField(String fieldName, Object fieldValue)
    Specify a column name to be saved
    DatabaseSaveBuilder<T>
    DatabaseSaveBuilder.uniqueKey(String fieldName, Object fieldValue)
    Specify a natural key for this table.
